functions.name: AddLifeCycle
functions.desc: Adds an item lifecycle into the game system

params.name: itemLifeCycle
params.desc: The lifecycle to be cached on the system

functions.name: AddLifeCycles
functions.desc: Adds an array of lifecycles into the game system

params.name: itemLifeCycle
params.desc: The array of lifecycles to be cached on the system

functions.name: AddItem
functions.desc: In order for the inventory system to know that an item exists you must cache its information into the service

params.name: item
params.desc: The item you want to cache into the system

functions.name: AddItems
functions.desc: This caches the information of multiple items into the inventory system

params.name: items
params.desc: An array of items

functions.name: GiveItem
functions.desc: Gives an item to a player. This should be given by name in order for the system to find it and give it

params.name: player
params.desc: The player that should receive the item

params.name: itemName
params.desc: The name of the item you want to give

returns.desc: Returns the Item reference of the item that was just created

functions.name: RemoveItem
functions.desc: Removes an item from the players inventory

params.name: player
params.desc: The player that should receive the item

params.name: itemId
params.desc: The name of the item you want to give

returns.desc: Returns if the item was correctly removed or not

functions.name: GetPlayerItemByName
functions.desc: Returns the first item it can find by the given name

params.name: player
params.desc: The player that owns the item

params.name: itemName
params.desc: The name of the item

returns.desc: Returns the item if it found one

functions.name: RemoveItemByName
functions.desc: Removes the first item is can find by the given name

params.name: player
params.desc: The player that owns the item

params.name: itemName
params.desc: The name of the item

functions.name: GetPlayerItem
functions.desc: Gives the requested item by ID

params.name: player
params.desc: The player that owns the item

params.name: itemId
params.desc: The id of the item

returns.lua_type: Item.Item Returns the item of the player

functions.name: GetEquippedItem
functions.desc: Returns the currently equipped item by the player

params.name: player
params.desc: The target player to search for

returns.desc: Returns the item that is currently equipped

functions.name: GetInventory
functions.desc: Returns the current full inventory of the player

params.name: player
params.lua_type: Player The player that owns the inventory

functions.name: ClearInventory
functions.desc: Completely empties the inventory of a player

params.name: player
params.desc: The player that owns the inventory

functions.name: DropItem
functions.desc:
Drops an item a player is holding so that other players can collect it by touching
the object in the ground

params.name: player
params.desc: The player that will drop the item

params.name: itemId
params.desc: The ID of the item that will be dropped

params.name: dropCFrame
params.desc: The position at which the item shoud be dropped. By default it will be in front of the player

functions.name: UnequipItem
functions.desc: Unequips whatever item the player has equipped if he has any

params.name: player
params.desc: The player that is using an item

functions.name: EquipItem
functions.desc: Equips a players item

params.name: player
params.desc: The target player

params.name: itemId
params.desc: The ID of the item you want to equip

functions.name: _GenerateItem
functions.desc: Generates a newly created item

params.name: player
params.desc: The target player

params.name: item
params.desc: The item object

functions.name: _CacheItem
functions.desc: Caches the item in the players inventory

params.name: player
params.desc: The player that owns the item

params.name: itemId
params.desc: The id of the item

functions.name: _GripItem
functions.desc: Grips the item to the player

params.name: player
params.desc: The player that will grip on the item

params.name: itemId
params.desc: The unique ID of the item

functions.name: _GetLifeCycles
functions.desc: Gets a lifecycle template with the given item name

params.name: itemName
params.desc: The name of the item

functions.name: _GetItemLifeCycles
functions.desc: Gets a lifecycle by an itemID

params.name: itemId
params.desc: The ID of the item

functions.name: _SetLifeCycles
functions.desc: Adds a lifecycle to a given weapon

params.name: player
params.desc: The target player

params.name: item
params.desc: The item object

functions.name: _RemoveLifeCycles
functions.desc: Removes the lifecycle which is attached to a given weapon

params.name: itemId
params.desc: The ID of the item

functions.name: _PlayerJoined
functions.desc: Fired when a player joins

params.name: player
params.desc: The target player

functions.name: _CharacterAdded
functions.desc: Fired when a player respawns

params.name: player
params.desc: The target player

functions.name: _PlayerLeft
functions.desc: Fired when a player leaves

params.name: player
params.desc: The target player

functions.name: _ChangedItemData
functions.desc: Updates the client with the required information

params.name: player
params.desc: The target player

params.name: itemId
params.desc: The ID of the item

params.name: dataIndex
params.desc: The index to identify the custom value

params.name: newValue
params.desc: The new item value

name: InventoryService
desc: This contains the Inventory Service that manages our server side of the inventory
